item.title: First Post
item.description: Dillinger Dillinger is a cloud-enabled, mobile-ready, offline-storage, AngularJS powered HTML5 Markdown editor. Type some Markdown on the left See HTML in the right Magic New Features! Import a HTML file and watch it magically convert to Markdown Drag and drop images (requires your Dropbox account be linked) You can also: Import and save files from GitHub, Dropbox, Google Drive and One Drive Drag and drop markdown and HTML files into Dillinger Export documents as Markdown, HTML and PDF Markdown is a lightweight markup language based on the formatting conventions that people naturally use in email.
